Package model

Interface ModelPersistence

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ModelDatabase
    public interface ModelPersistence
    Interface containing methods related to persistence of the system (in this version, persistence is achieved with use of database)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.util.ArrayList<Order> loadOrdersFromShop​(java.lang.String address)
      Method loading data about orders from certain shop
      ShopList loadShops()
      Method loading data about shops (with their items and products)
      UserList loadUsers()
      Method loading data about users (employees)
      void save​(java.lang.String address, Item item)
      Method saving new item
      void save​(java.lang.String address, Order order)
      Method saving new order
      void save​(Product product)
      Method saving new product
      void update​(java.lang.String address, Item item)
      Method saving updates to already existing item (only used when updating values of item not related to the product)
      void update​(java.lang.String address, Item item, Date expirationDateFromDb, int productNumberFromDb, boolean isProductChanged)
      Method saving updates to already existing item (method used when drastic changes are made to item, for example - new product number assigned to it)
      void updateCompletedOrder​(Order order)
      Method saving order after is has been completed (saving its new status)

    • Method Detail

      • save

        void save​(java.lang.String address,
          Order order)
        Method saving new order
        Parameters:
        address - shop address where order was made
        order - order that should be saved

      • save

        void save​(java.lang.String address,
          Item item)
        Method saving new item
        Parameters:
        address - shop address where order was made
        item - item that should be saved

      • save

        void save​(Product product)
        Method saving new product
        Parameters:
        product - product that should be saved

      • update

        void update​(java.lang.String address,
            Item item)
        Method saving updates to already existing item (only used when updating values of item not related to the product)
        Parameters:
        address - shop address where the item is located at
        item - item which parameters are updated and needs to be saved

      • update

        void update​(java.lang.String address,
            Item item,
            Date expirationDateFromDb,
            int productNumberFromDb,
            boolean isProductChanged)
        Method saving updates to already existing item (method used when drastic changes are made to item, for example - new product number assigned to it)
        Parameters:
        address - shop address where the item is located at
        item - item which parameters are updated and needs to be saved
        expirationDateFromDb - previous expiration date of an item (allows locating item in a stored data)
        isProductChanged - indicator whether some property related to product was changed in an item
        productNumberFromDb - previous product number of a product of which type is item (allows locating item in a stored data)

      • updateCompletedOrder

        void updateCompletedOrder​(Order order)
        Method saving order after is has been completed (saving its new status)
        Parameters:
        order - order that has to have its new status saved

      • loadUsers

        UserList loadUsers()
        Method loading data about users (employees)
        Returns:
        UserList containing all existing users

      • loadShops

        ShopList loadShops()
        Method loading data about shops (with their items and products)
        Returns:
        ShopList with complete data about existing shops in the system

      • loadOrdersFromShop

        java.util.ArrayList<Order> loadOrdersFromShop​(java.lang.String address)
        Method loading data about orders from certain shop
        Parameters:
        address - shop address where orders were created
        Returns:
        ArrayList containing orders made in shop matching passed value
